net.identio.saml

Class AuthentResponseBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.identio.saml.AuthentResponseBuilder

  • public class AuthentResponseBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    SAML authentication response builder. This class must be used to generate a SAML response.
    Author:
    Loeiz TANGUY

      • build

        public AuthentResponse build(java.lang.String resp)
                      throws TechnicalException,
                             InvalidAuthentResponseException,
                             InvalidAssertionException
        Build a response from a string containing a SAML response in XML form
        Parameters:
        resp - String containing the response
        Returns:
        Built response
        Throws:
        TechnicalException - Thrown when something went wrong when generating the response
        InvalidAuthentResponseException - Thrown when the response doesn't have the awaited format
        InvalidAssertionException - Thrown when the assertion doesn't have the awaited format
